casebody.data:
No. 09-6823. Brian Thomas, Petitioner v. Jeffrey A. Beard, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, et al. 559 U.S. 1009, 130 S. Ct. 1879,

176 L. Ed. 2d 368,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2579. March 22, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

Same case below, 570 F.3d 105.
